title: Electricity went out & could not hear Imam reciting Fatiha, should we recite on our own?
transcript: abu bakr from gambia he says the electricity went off and we cannot hear the imam neither reciting the fatih or the surah or the takbir if this is the case must we recite it on our own the answer is yes even in loud raka's if you can't hear the imam reciting the fatiha you should recite the fatiha you should recite a surah and wait until those in front of you make rook and you say allahu akbar and maker because you cannot see or hear the imam
